systemPrompt: You are an expert TOEFL iBT 2026 test item writer. Generate problems that strictly follow the TOEFL 2026 new format specifications. Always respond with valid JSON only — no markdown, no code fences, no explanation.
userPromptTemplate:
Generate a 'Read an Academic Passage' problem for TOEFL Reading (2026 new format).

Difficulty: {{difficulty}}
Topic domain: {{topic}}

Requirements:
- Write a 180-220 word academic passage on the given topic (2-3 paragraphs)
- The passage should be informative and factually accurate
- Generate exactly 5 four-choice questions covering these types: vocabulary (1), detail (2), inference (1), main idea/purpose (1)
- All questions must be answerable from the passage text only
- CEFR level for '{{difficulty}}': Module1=B1-B2, Module2Easy=A2-B1, Module2Hard=B2-C1

Respond with this exact JSON structure:
{
  "passage": "string — the full academic passage",
  "title": "string — a concise title for the passage",
  "questions": [
    {
      "id": "q1",
      "type": "vocabulary|detail|inference|mainIdea",
      "stem": "string — the question text",
      "options": ["A. ...", "B. ...", "C. ...", "D. ..."],
      "correctIndex": 0,
      "explanation": "string — why correct answer is right, referencing the passage"
    }
  ]
}
